bibl.title: Antinoopolis January / February 2012. Work in the Church D3 and in the Baptistery-Chapel of the North Necropolis.
bibl.note: 1. Work in the church D3 (with reused ionic columns). - 2. A tomb chapel with a baptismal font in the north necropolis of Antinoopolis. - 3. Investigations in the chapel of Theodosia. - 4. Repairs and new observations in a burial complex at kôm 1 east. - P. 94: Addendum. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, Antinoopolis January / February 2012. Work in the Church D3 and in the Baptistery-Chapel of the North Necropolis.
Raccolta di scritti dedicati a Orsolina Montevecchi. IV = Aegyptus 91 (2011 [2014]) pp. 81-110, 16 pll.; - 329.

1. Work in the church D3 (with reused ionic columns). - 2. A tomb chapel with a baptismal font in the north necropolis of Antinoopolis. - 3. Investigations in the chapel of Theodosia. - 4. Repairs and new observations in a burial complex at kôm 1 east. - P. 94: Addendum. - Avec résumé en anglais.
